Package ru.itmo.se.utilities

Class MusicBandValidator

java.lang.Object
ru.itmo.se.utilities.MusicBandValidator
public class MusicBandValidator extends Object
Utility class used for validating all data and conforming them to necessary constraints.

  • Field Summary

    • fileMode

      private boolean fileMode
      This field holds the value of whether the validator is working in file mode (in script) or not.

    • IDset

      private static Set<Integer> IDset
      This field stores all the values of ID's. Set is used here to ensure the IDs' uniqueness constraint.

    • formats

      private static final DateTimeFormatterBuilder formats
      This field stores all possible date formats for the field EstablishmentDate.

    • askQuestion

      public boolean askQuestion (String question)
      This method is used to update a music band's data. Every question is optional.
      Parameters:
      question - whether the user wants to update a field.
      Returns:
      true if yes ("+"),

      false if not ("-").

    • checkID

      static boolean checkID (Integer ID)
      This method is used to check whether an ID conforms to the required constraints.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the ID doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

    • checkUniqueID

      private static boolean checkUniqueID (Integer ID)
      This method is used to check whether an ID is unique or not.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the ID is not unique,

      false if it is.

    • checkName

      static boolean checkName (CharSequence name)
      This method is used to check whether a name conforms to the required constraints.
      Parameters:
      name - the ID to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the name doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

    • checkX

      static boolean checkX (float x)
      This method is used to check whether an X value conforms to the required constraints.
      Parameters:
      x - the abscissa value to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the abscissa doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

    • checkY

      static boolean checkY (float y)
      This method is used to check whether a Y value conforms to the required constraints.
      Parameters:
      y - the ordinate value to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the ordinate doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

      static boolean checkDate (Date creationDate)
      This method is used to check whether a creation date conforms to the required constraints.

      creationDate - the creation date to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the creation date doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

      Parameters:
      numberOfParticipants - the creation date to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the number of participants doesn't meet the requirements,

      false if it does.

      Returns:
      true if the genre doesn't meet the requirements,
